turns.content: GDMI 600x600 ZM in hospital lab ATEX 22.

For the hospital lab application, we're configuring a GDMI 600x600 housing made of ZM (ZincMagnesium), which offers C5 corrosion resistance suitable for hygienic environments.The system will be installed in ATEX Zone 22, indicating an Explosive Atmosphere. In such environments, static discharge from non-grounded components can create sparks, posing an ignition risk. Therefore, the filter housing requires proper electrostatic grounding.To finalize the configuration, I need two details:What is the required airflow (mÂ³/h)?
